note.p: Daughter of Edward Joseph Weston, MD, of London, and his wife Sarah Weare Weston. Married, as his third wife, John Brown Willis Fleming (1815–72), of North Stoneham Park, Hampshire, in 1870. Married Robert Cecil Sayers in 1884.
Alum. Cantab. s.v. Fleming (post Willis-Fleming), John Browne Willis
